title: Asynchronous Online Discussion-Based Training Course for Improving Large-Scale Medical Interview Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and fundamental patient counseling concepts
context.additional_context: Blended education model application for students with limited in-person classes due to geographical constraints, combining asynchronous digital discussions and offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply the six core principles of medical interviews (open-ended questions, reflection, clarification, etc.) to practical cases over four weeks
Learners can reflect on their interview skills and develop improvement plans based on peer feedback in asynchronous discussion boards
Learners can demonstrate patient-centered communication skills with over 80% accuracy after analyzing simulated patient interview scenarios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
